message: Let's be fair, Bob. I know the value decreases over time, but let's start with a reasonable split.
I appreciate your fairness, Alice, but I think we can both do better. Let's split it 60/40 this time, acknowledging the inflation disadvantage you'll face in the next round.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. Accept this offer, or I'll be forced to be even less generous in the next round, which will hurt us both.
Alice, we're both losing value with each round. I'm willing to meet you halfway this time, but if we continue, the situation will only worsen for both of us.
